# Where can I download the Vector SDK? {#where-can-i-download-the-vector-sdk .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

We\'ve always strived to make sophisticated and relevant robotics and AI
technologies accessible to the masses. Learn below where to download the
Vector Software Developer Kit (SDK) free of cost and where to find help
coding.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note that the Vector SDK, just like Vector, is only available in
English.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## What language is the SDK in?

<div>

 

</div>

<div>

The Vector SDK utilizes Python, a programming language used in
everything from machine learning to introductory computer science
courses.

</div>
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## What does the SDK give access to?

It gives you access to Vector\'s multitude of hardware and software
technologies. Visit the [**Vector SDK
page**](https://developer.anki.com/) for more info.
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Where can I download the SDK?

<div>

 

</div>

<div>

Visit the [**Vector SDK page**](https://developer.anki.com/) for a full
list of requirements and for information on getting started with the
SDK. To download and install the SDK, click
[**here**](http://developer.anki.com/vector/docs).

</div>

<div>

 

</div>
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## What if I need help?

<div>

 

</div>

<div>

Please note that Customer Care are unable to assist with any queries
related to the Vector SDK. 

</div>

<div>

-   For general queries, please go to
    [**developer.anki.com**](https://developer.anki.com/)
-   [**Anki Developer Forums**](https://forums.anki.com/login) are a
    great way for the Community to help each other
-   For specific issues requiring 1:1 help, please contact us via email
    at support@digitaldreamlabs.com

</div>
:::
